text: 3:7 Matyu 25:41; 2 Tesalonika 1:8; 2 Pita 3:10Kamaghɨra God fomɨra mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, a datɨrɨghɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨar igharazim anɨngi, datɨrɨghɨn overiam ko nguazim ikia avim bagha mɨzuai, avim otoghɨva bar aning kuavaremegham. Ezɨ nguazim ko overiam Godɨn Kotiar Ekiam Otivamin Dughiam bagha mɨzuai. Dughiar kamɨn gumazamizir akɨrim ragha God gasaraziba, me bar ikuvigham.
